content.text: Hi, my name is Dan. What's yours?
Hi Dan, I'm Sarah.
It's nice to meet you, Sarah. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go for walks, listen to music, and eat chocolate.
I like going for walks too! I also like to play video games and watch movies.
I like video games too! What kind do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different types of games, but my favorite are probably role-playing games and action-adventure games.
Those sound like fun! I've never really played a role-playing game before, but I've heard they're really good.
They are! You should give one a try sometime.
I will! I'm always looking for new things to try.
What's your favorite kind of music?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite is probably alternative rock.
I like alternative rock too! I'm a big fan of bands like The Killers and The Strokes.
I love those bands! I'm also a big fan of The National and Interpol.
Those are great bands too! I'm glad we have similar taste in music.
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who likes the same things you do.
Definitely! So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I also like to read, go to the movies, and hang out with my friends.
Those all sound like great things to do! I like to read too, and I go to the movies a lot. I don't have as many friends as I used to, but I still enjoy spending time with the ones I have.
I'm glad you have some good friends. I'm not sure what I would do without mine.
Me neither! They're the best.
It sounds like we have a lot in common.
Yeah, we do! I'm glad we met.
Me too
